name: Dino Bread Delivery Service
description:
It's Halloween, no one else at the Dino Bread Delivery Service wants to go out. That's because of the ghosts.

But you? You are Brave!(ish) and you are going to single handedly deliver all the bread required over the next 4 days, on time and with no problems!

Use WASD to move

Left click hold to aim and release to throw bread.

Aim for the mailboxes, not the houses

Don't get close to too many ghosts at once!

This is my entry for the Godot Wild Jam #26. My first gamejam entry in years!
